channel.title: Can someone make a bone burying script?
channel.description:
I'm too lazy to learn the syntax, so can someone make a Powerbot script that stands by a bank (Any F2P bank location), withdraws a full inventory of bones (Normal bones), burys them all, and repeats that, closing the bot when out of bones?
Thanks, I will <3 you forever

item.title: Can someone make a bone burying script?
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

http://pure2.info/scripts/xbonebury.html

Love pure2ownage.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make a bone burying script?

item.title: Can someone make a bone burying script?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Spades:

The camera randomly shakes ever so slightly randomly that it throws-off some bots, it is a very minor shaking and rotating. Also, they made it so after being logged in after a certain amount of time it will just kick you.

What a interesting new feature that was added, I’m not going to lie.

OT: Just look around on Google or Powerbot. Use some cash if needed, other than that, I don’t know if someone is going to make something for you.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make a bone burying script?
